While having the target under the effects of the [[Odourless Poison Mist]], Karenbana releases flower petals, before casting the illusion that she had turned into a multitude of flower petals herself, which flow through the air and circle the target. With the target hindered, she can freely move through the flower petals and attack the target without being seen. 

== Drawbacks ==
The downside to this illusion is that it only hides Karenbana visually. Meaning the target is still able to interact with the outside world, as seen when [[Naruto]] released a widespread shock wave to knock her back, and when [[Sakura]] was able to pinpoint her location after hearing her step on broken glass.

==Trivia==
* Though unnamed in the movie, this technique was named in the ''[[Naruto Collectible Card Game]]''.

[[es:Genjutsu: Dispersión de Pétalos]]
[[pl:Technika Stu Rozkwitających Kwiatów]]
